about_the_game:
■ About This Game



"Who's Who?" is an online party game that you can enjoy with your friends.
Find the real players hidden among the AI characters and be the last one standing!
But be careful! You don't want to be caught either!


It is important to find the real players hidden among the AI characters.
But, it is just as important for you to stay hidden from the other players.
Deceive other players by pretending to be one of the AI characters.


Is the character walking toward you real or not?
Keep your eyes open for anything suspicious!


If you think a character is a real player, do not hesitate to attack them!
You only have one chance.

Be the last survivor in this intense game of wits!
The thrill and excitement will get you hooked.

■ Features

- Various game modes
> Police and Thief Mode:
Tons of magnificent treasures are displayed all over the museum!
Become a thief and steal the treasure without getting caught by the Polices.
Or you can become a Police and catch the thieves instead.

> Where`s everybody? Mode:
In a space where everyone pretends to be an AI character, spot players who are acting suspiciously!
Do not let your guard down until you become the last one standing.

There are several more modes that you can enjoy!

- Cute characters and different costumes
> Customize your character with different costumes.
The high quality 3D graphics add to the fun and cuteness of the characters.

Note: We allow any form of streaming and video recording of "Who's Who?"

highlighted.name: The hand is quicker than the eye

name: Who's Who?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Enjoy an intense game of wits with friends all around the world! Experience a sense of thrill and achievement by becoming the last survivor. Play different modes including "Police and Thief" and "Where`s everybody?".
supported_languages: English, Korean, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
